original_text: For the leaders of this people cause them to err; and they that are led of them are destroyed.
korean_text: 백성을 인도하는 자가 그들을 미혹하니 인도를 받는 자들이 멸망을 당하는도다

sentences.original_text: For the leaders of this people cause them to err
sentences.korean_translation: 이 백성의 지도자들이 그들을 잘못 인도하기 때문이니

sentences.original_text: and they that are led of them are destroyed
